verses.name: 2 Chronicles 35:1
verses.text: Moreover Josiah kept a passover unto the Lord in Jerusalem: and they killed the passover on the fourteenth day of the first month.

verses.name: 2 Chronicles 35:2
verses.text: And he set the priests in their charges, and encouraged them to the service of the house of the Lord,

verses.name: 2 Chronicles 35:3
verses.text: And said unto the Levites that taught all Israel, which were holy unto the Lord, Put the holy ark in the house which Solomon the son of David king of Israel did build; it shall not be a burden upon your shoulders: serve now the Lord your God, and his people Israel,
